DOC.brief_summary: To compare antiviral activity , safety , pharmacokinetics saquinavir hard gel capsule ( HGC ) formulation , 1 3 dos saquinavir soft gel capsule ( SGC ) formulation administer orally every 8 hour 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Saquinavir Hard- Soft-Gelatin Capsules HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign one four treatment group follow : Group 1 : 10 patient receive saquinavir HGC . Group 2 : 10 patient receive saquinavir SGC . Group 3 : 30 patient receive saquinavir SGC intermediate dose . Group 4 : 30 patient receive saquinavir SGC high study dose . Upon completion initial 4 week , patient may option continue originally-assigned therapy monotherapy unless significant drug toxicity intervenes . If analysis initial 4 week data identifies optimal dose saquinavir SGC , patient may option change optimal dose treatment extension phase protocol . Patients extension phase may choose remain monotherapy unless experience significant drug toxicity , CD4 count HIV-RNA level return baseline , saquinavir approve FDA study termination , whichever come first . NOTE : A washout > = 28 day require patient antiretroviral therapy .
